title: Klúbbaþátturinn Flex - 09.09.06, Óli Ofur
text:
Óli Ofur gerði það gott í Flex á laugardagskvöldið.
Ghozt & Óli Ofur - MP3 (190mb)
http://www.minnsirkus.is/Upload/flex/thaettir/flex-20060909.mp3
Ghozt
1.	Gunnar í krossinum (A Fucking Maniac’s Intro)
2.	Jonfri - Hiptechfusion (Dubversion Mix)
3.	Stian Klo - Kaptein Klaus (Original Mix)
4.	Pet Shop Boys - Sodom (Trentemoller Remix)
5.	Skylark - When In Rome (Original Mix)
6.	Shilo - Dream On (Luke Chable Remix)
7.	Phatjak - So High (Mashtronic Remix)
8.	Demi - Gearbox (Original Mix)
9.	Ramsay - Shake That Thing (Max Graham Remix)
10.	Mason - Exceeder (Original Mix)
11.	Sander Kleinenberg - My Lexicon (16bit Lolitas Remix)
Óli Ofur
1.	Sigur Rós – Takk (+Ofur intro)
2.	Nathan Fake – The Sky Was Pink (Martinez remix)
3.	Extrawelt – Last Past
4.	Marc Romboy & Stephan Bodzin – The Alchemist
5.	Touane – Bassic
6.	Chris Micali – 25 (+Munnhörpuleikarinn)
7.	D.A.T.A. – Take Your Babe by The Ass
8.	Riton & Heidi – Vejer (Jesse Rose Remix)
9.	Etienne De Crecy – Suck
10.	Paul Kalkbrenner – Keule
11.	Tomas Schumacher – Red Purple
12.	Stephan Bodzin – Tron
13.	Greg Cerrone – Friday Night
14.	Josh Wink – How’s The Evening so Far? feat. Lil Lois
15.	Marc Romboy – Model 1601 (Fairmont remix)
http://www.flex.is
